kw.name: POST
kw.msg: POST Request : url=https://geeks-api-andre.fly.dev/users path_url=/users headers={'User-Agent': 'python-requests/2.28.2', 'Accept-Encoding': 'gzip, deflate', 'Accept': '*/*', 'Connection': 'keep-alive', 'Content-Length': '75', 'Content-Type': 'application/json'} body=b'{"name": "Clint Barton", "email": "clint@shield.com", "password": "pwd123"}'

kw.name: Status Should Be
kw.doc: Fails if response status code is different than the expected.
